data.text: Egha me aghorir bizibar abarim na ganɨngi, an aghorir suiagharuimɨn mɨn gari, egha me kamagh na mɨgei, “Nɨ dɨkavigh Godɨn Dɨpenim ko ofa gamir dakozimɨn apan. Egh nɨ dɨpenir kamɨn Godɨn ziam fer gumazamizibar dɨbobonim dɨpon.

11:2 Esekiel 40:17-20; Daniel 8:10; Luk 21:24; Akar Mogomem 12:6; 13:5Egh nɨ Godɨn Dɨpenim okarizir danganir dɨvazir ekiamɨn aven itim, an apanan markɨ. God Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba danganir uari akuvir kam me ganɨngi. Eghtɨ marazi izɨ Jerusalem dɨkɨ mangɨ 42plan iakɨnibar tugham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ anetakigh.11:2 Akar Mogomem 11:2ɨn faragha itir akam, nɨ Aposelbar Ingangaribar 21:30ɨn gan. Akar Mogomem 11:2ɨn akar igharazir kam, 42plan iakɨniba, da 1,260plan arueba, o 3plan azeniba gɨvazɨma uam akuam. Da 42plan iakɨniba ko magh ghue. Nɨ Daniel 7:25 ko 12:7ɨn gan. Nɨ akar Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba Jerusalem dɨkabɨrazimɨn gansɨva, Luk 21:24ɨn gan.

11:3 Akar Mogomem 12:6; 19:10; 20:4Eghtɨ kɨ uan akamɨn gun mɨkɨmamin gumazir pumuning amadagh gavgavim aning danightɨma, aning nan akam inigh mangam. Aning osɨmtɨzir korotiabar aghuighɨva, egh nan akam kun mangɨva, 1,260plan dughiabar tugham.”
Gumazir kamning mati olivɨn temer pumuning ko lamɨn pumuning nguazir kamɨn Ekiamɨn guamɨn tughav iti.11:4 Nɨ Sekaraia 4:1-5, ko 4:10-14, ko Akar Mogomem 1:12ɨn gan.

11:5 Ofa Gami 10:2; 2 Samuel 22:9; 2 Atriviba 1:10-12; Onger Akaba 97:3; Jeremaia 5:14; Hosea 6:5Eghtɨ gumazitam arazir kurabar aning damusɨ damutɨ, avim aningɨn akamningɨn otogh, bar aningɨn apanibar isigh me gasɨghasigham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazir manam arazir kuramɨn aning damusɨ, an ovegham.

11:6 Ua Me Ini 7:17-19; 1 Samuel 4:8; 1 Atriviba 17:1Aning overiamɨn aneghoroghamin gavgavim iti, egh aning Godɨn akamɨn gun mɨkɨmamin dughiamɨn, aning mɨkɨmtɨ, amozim dughiar kamɨn izan kogham. Eghtɨ aning dɨpabar amutɨ, da bar ghuzimɨn otivamin gavgavim iti. Aning uaghan bizir kurar igharazibar amutɨ, da nguazimɨn gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨghamim gavgavim iti. Dughiar kamɨn, aning bizir kabara amutɨ da aning ifongezɨ moghɨn otivam.
Aning Godɨn akamɨn gun mɨgeir ingangarim agɨvaghtɨ, mozir torir bar konezimɨn itir asɨzir atiam, a torim ategh anangam. Egh an aning ko mɨsoghɨva, aning abɨragh aning mɨsueghtɨ aning aremegham.

11:8 Aisaia 1:9-10; Luk 13:34; Hibru 13:12; Akar Mogomem 14:8; 18:10; 18:24Eghtɨ aningɨn kuamning nguibar ekiar kamɨn tuavir ekiamɨn irɨghɨv ikiam. E akar isɨn zuimɨn a dɨbora ghaze, Sodom o Isip. Nguibar kamra me fomɨra gumazir kamningɨn Ekiam, ter ighuvimɨn a gafugha a mɨsoghezɨ an areme.

Gumazamizir mɨkarzir igharagha gariba, men marazi ko anababa bar, dar gumazamizir maba ko nguibabar akaba bar, dar gumazamizir maba ko kantriba bar, dar gumazamiziba, men marazi dughiar 3pla ko akuamɨn aningɨn kuamningɨn ganam. Egh aningɨn kuamning afan anogoregham.

11:10 Akar Mogomem 12:12; 13:8; 16:10Nguazimɨn gumazamiziba kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir kamning, aning mɨzazir bar kuram nguazimɨn gumazamizibagh anɨngi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me bar aningɨn ovevem gifuegham, egh bar ighiabar amu, damɨva, egh bizir aghuiba uan namakabar anɨngam.
Ezɨ 3plan dughiaba ko dughiar akuar kam gɨvazɨ, God uam aning gamizɨma, aning ua dɨkavigha tughav iti, ezɨ gumazamizir aningɨn ganiziba bar atiatingi.

11:12 2 Atriviba 2:1; 2:5-7; 2:11; Aisaia 14:13; Aposel 1:9; Akar Mogomem 12:5Ezɨ aning orazi tiarir mam Godɨn Nguibamɨn kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua kagh anang.” Ezɨ aningɨn apaniba garavɨra itima, aning Godɨn Nguibamɨn ghuavanabo.

Ezɨ dughiar kamra mɨkɨmkɨzir dafam otozɨ, God nguibar ekiamɨn dɨpeniba 10plan okoruabar da tuirazɨ dar okoruar mam bar ikufi. Ezɨ 7,000plan gumazamiziba ariaghire, ezɨ ariaghirezir puvatɨziba ikia, bar atiatigha Godɨn uan Nguibamɨn itimɨn ziam fe.
Iavzika, ia orakigh! Osɨmtɨzir bar ekiar namba 2, a gɨfa. Ezɨ osɨmtɨzir bar ekiar namba 3, an otivasa bar roghɨra izi.
Ezɨ enselɨn namba 7 uan sɨgham givima, Godɨn Nguibamɨn itir darazi tiariba akara ghaze:
Ezɨ 24plan gumazir dapanir Godɨn guamɨn uan atrivir dabirabibagh apiaziba, me teviba apɨrigha uan guaba nguazim mɨtuagha Godɨn ziam fe.
Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba bar puvɨram atari,

24plan gumazir dapaniba mɨkemegha gɨvazɨma, Godɨn Dɨpenir an Nguibamɨn itim kuiaghirɨzɨma, me garima, Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim itir Boksiam Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven iti. Ezɨ overiamɨn onɨmariba taghtagha tintinibar zuima, nɨgɨnir dafam otozɨ, arariba dagarvasi, ezɨ mɨkɨmkɨzim otozɨ amozir ofɨzir ekiar dagɨabar mɨn gariba iri.
